unsolicitedIdeaPolicy.title: Unsolicited Ideas Policy
unsolicitedIdeaPolicy.paragraph: {{companyName}} and its employees do not accept unsolicited ideas. This includes ideas for new advertising campaigns, promotions, products, technologies, product improvements, processes, materials, marketing plans, or product names. Please send {{companyName}} or any of its employees, any unsolicited ideas, original creative artwork, suggestions or other works (“Submissions”) in any form. This policy is intended solely to avoid potential misunderstandings or disputes if {{companyName}}'s products or marketing strategies may be similar to the ideas submitted to {{companyName}}. If you choose to send us your ideas despite our request, the following terms and conditions will apply to your submissions, regardless of the content of your letter.
